bibl.title: A Petition to the Prefect of Egypt and Related Imperial Edicts.
bibl.note: Original petition with the subscriptio of the prefect. Subscriptio: February 25, A.D. 209. - Published here in advance of its appearance in a volume of Oxyrhynchite papyri [= P. Oxy. XLVII, 3364].
bibl.seg: Thomas J. David, A Petition to the Prefect of Egypt and Related Imperial Edicts.
Original petition with the subscriptio of the prefect. Subscriptio: February 25, A.D. 209. - Published here in advance of its appearance in a volume of Oxyrhynchite papyri [= P. Oxy. XLVII, 3364].
